changeSet.author: behzod
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE store( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY , name VARCHAR, opens TIMESTAMP, closes TIMESTAMP, address_id BIGINT, created_date TIMESTAMP, last_modified_date TIMESTAMP, created_by VARCHAR, last_modified_by VARCHAR );

CREATE TABLE store_products( store_id BIGINT REFERENCES store(id), product_id BIGINT REFERENCES product(id), created_date TIMESTAMP, last_modified_date TIMESTAMP, created_by VARCHAR, last_modified_by VARCHAR );
